I hope this message finds you well.

We are now approaching the deadline to present our audit results to the Risk and Crisis Management Committee at the end of this week. Despite our follow up and reminders, we have not received the written responses and action plans in the tracker we shared earlier. As a result, your respective control gaps will be marked as "No Management Response Received".
